definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: I also like roller-skating. It's interesting.
sentences.chinese: 我也喜歡滑旱冰，很有意思。

sentences.english: Harvey and his friend are going inline skating.
sentences.chinese: 哈衛和他的朋友要去滑旱冰。

sentences.english: My wife and I just accompany my daughter going roller skating.
sentences.chinese: 我愛人和我只是陪我的女兒滑旱冰。

sentences.english: Do you want to go roller skating with me?
sentences.chinese: 你想和我一起去滑旱冰嗎？

sentences.english: Enjoy skiing, sledding, or ice skating.
sentences.chinese: 學會滑雪，玩雪橇或者滑旱冰。

sentences.english: I usually go roller skating on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 我通常在週日去滑旱冰。

sentences.english: The boy can do roller skating.
Oh , you can go roller skating at the zoo .
sentences.chinese: 哦，你能在動物園滑旱冰。
比爾喜歡打棒球和滑旱冰。

sentences.english: Well, flying kites is more fun to me.
sentences.chinese: 你覺得放風箏和滑旱冰哪個更有趣？

sentences.english: Which is more interesting to you, flying kites or going roller-skating?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得放風箏和滑旱冰哪個更有趣？

sentences.english: Teach me to skate, hold me to run nearly 100kms.
sentences.chinese: 教我滑旱冰，扶着我跑了快100公里。

sentences.english: Riding my bike or skating alone was no fun.
sentences.chinese: 騎自行車或滑旱冰也變得沒意思了。

sentences.english: Throw the Frisbee with friends in the park. Go rollerblading.
sentences.chinese: 和朋友們在公園裏扔飛碟，去滑旱冰。

sentences.english: I wanted to build tree houses and go to roller-skating parties.
sentences.chinese: 我想要建樹上小屋和參加滑旱冰晚會。

definition: skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
